name: Vegan Black Bean Soup
description: This easy Vegan Black Bean Soup made from dried soaked black beans is a delicious plant-based Instant Pot meal that is perfect for feeding a crowd on a budget.

video.name: INSTANT POT VEGAN BLACK BEAN SOUP RECIPE | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
INSTANT POT VEGAN BLACK BEAN SOUP RECIPE

FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-black-bean-soup-instant-pot-recipe/

SUBSCRIBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

This easy Vegan Black Bean Soup made from dried soaked black beans is a delicious plant-based Instant Pot meal that is perfect for feeding a crowd on a budget.

The greatest advantage of making a soup using dried soaked black beans is that, as they cook, they not only flavor the liquid but also thicken it to a rich and savory broth that’s a million times tastier than anything canned beans can do for you.

******MORE SOUP RECIPES FROM THE BLOG******

CURRIED BUTTERNUT SQUASH SOUP: https://www.veganricha.com/curried-butternut-squash-soup-vegan/

VEGAN CHICKPEA RICE SOUP: https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-chickpea-rice-soup/

VEGAN LENTIL SOUP INSTANT POT OR SAUCEPAN: https://www.veganricha.com/everyday-vegan-lentil-soup/

COOKBOOKS BY RICHA HINGLE (VEGAN RICHA): https://www.veganricha.com/mybooks/

Connect with me on Social Media:

#veganricha #easyveganreecipes #instantpotrecipe #veganinstantpotrecipe #vegansoup #instantpot

recipeIngredient: 1 cup black beans (soaked overnight or at least 1/2 hour in hot water)
1 tsp chili powder blend or 1/2 tsp chipotle pepper or both
2.5 cups water/broth mixture , (3 cups for soupy)

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the black beans if you haven't already while you prep ingredients and start cooking.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the black beans if you haven't already while you prep ingredients and start cooking.

recipeInstructions.text: Start the IP on saute. Add oil, onion, garlic, and a pinch of salt and cook until translucent. Deglaze with broth if needed. Add the spices and salt and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Start the IP on saute. Add oil, onion, garlic, and a pinch of salt and cook until translucent. Deglaze with broth if needed. Add the spices and salt and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Add tomato and mix in and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add tomato and mix in and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the drained beans and water/broth and mix really well to pick up any stuck bits.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the drained beans and water/broth and mix really well to pick up any stuck bits.

recipeInstructions.text: Close the lid. Pressure cook for 35 mins. (40 mins if you didn't soak the beans overnight)
recipeInstructions.name: Close the lid. Pressure cook for 35 mins. (40 mins if you didn't soak the beans overnight)

recipeInstructions.text: Pressure cook for another 10 mins if the beans are not done to preference.
recipeInstructions.name: Pressure cook for another 10 mins if the beans are not done to preference.

recipeInstructions.text: Add lime juice, taste and adjust salt and flavor. Blend 2 cups of the soup and mix it in. Bring to a boil and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Add lime juice, taste and adjust salt and flavor. Blend 2 cups of the soup and mix it in. Bring to a boil and serve.

keywords: black bean soup recipe, vegan black bean soup, Vegan Instant pot soup
